title: France panorama. [No. 72/24]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Sugar and sweets - the International Confectionery Salon. Lars Bo - the Danish engraver’s Paris exhibition. Architecture, sculpture and data-processing - the Mirail Advanced Studies School and sculptor Jason Molfessis. 2. The Scientific Research Prize - the Prize awarded by the French National Scientific Research Center goes to Professor Halpern. 3. World Book Year - history of the Goncourt Jury. 4. The Ophiucus Ensemble - a new vocal group.
